title: The New Corporation is Coming!
blurb: The New Corporation had its world premiere at TIFF!
summary: Check out the hard-hitting trailer for The New Corporation, but don't just subscribe to our app, join us to change the world.

title: The Unfortunately Necessary Sequel
blurb: In 2003 we named the psychopath. Now, we’re back, with the unfortunately necessary sequel.
summary: Who would have thought a film about an economic institution would take off the way it did? 26 International awards, many millions of views later, and we still have unfinished business. Enter The New Corporation: The Unfortunately Necessary Sequel. This is our chance. The corporation’s do-over date has arrived. We can’t waste it.

title: Angus Wong left Business School after he saw the original film The Corporation.
blurb: Inspired by the original film The Corporation, Angus Wong decided to fight the corporations instead of working for them!
summary: With over 16 million members, Sum of Us is an organization that fights corporate power globally.

title: Inequities are laid bare with Coronavirus
blurb: In this clip from The New Corporation inequities of the Coronavirus are laid bare
summary: The connections between wealthy corporation's bailouts and and the disproporationate suffering by  marginalized communities are both endemic of the pandemic

title: An Handful of Corporations are destroying the Earth
blurb: In this clip from The New Corporation Heather McGhee asks what we will say to our grandchildren on the destruction of our planet.
summary: Former president and now senior fellow at Demos, McGhee calls for an understanding of how racism poisoned the democratic experiment from the beginning, and twisted the shape of our capitalist system in order to make people into property in the name of profit.

actions.text: Subscribe to follow the film and campaigns

title: Hyperloop Hob-nobbing at Davos!
blurb: In this clip from The New Corporation: Hyperloop founder Bebop Gresta takes his pitch to Davos
summary: The World Economic Forum at Davos is where the business elites gather to do business. Here Hyperloop meets Jamie Dimon, CEO of JP Morgan Chase, at a cocktail party of course.

actions.text: Subscribe to follow the film and campaigns
Find out where to see the film
Like many of the corporations represented at Davos, Hyperloop claims it's good for the planet - is it true? Or hype!

title: Amara Possian of 350.org talks about the impact of film
blurb: Amara Possian saw The Corporation (original film) when she was in Grade 12.
summary: Amara Possian was impacted by The Corporation when she was still in high school. Now she's very eager to use The New Corporation to train a new crop of young people to take on Corporate power and save the planet!
